name: ADD
description:
The Soviet Union made a breakthrough in automation and artificial intelligence to improve people's lives. Automatic systems were improved until humanity became an obstacle to further development. AI breaks out of control and plunges the whole world into darkness...

Lifeless metropolis. At the warehouse of the delivery service, a courier robot turns on. The only task in the program is to deliver the package.

Atmospheric adventure: take on the role of the last robot courier and wade through a shattered empty world consumed by automation. Find out who the last package is for.
Flashlight: light your path full of danger.

Charge level: watch the charge level of the little hero and charge yourself in time from power sources so as not to stay in the dark.

Stealth: cuddle to the ground and hide from enemies so as not to get caught.

Interactivity: interact with the environment to complete the mission and not die.
